content: of the stemmed double_crochet between the petals make 2dc s repeat round below repeat from * to the beginning of the this around the circle you should have 54 stitches round slip_stitch to first double_crochet sides round 15 ch1 *make 2 double_crochet s skip 1 stitch of the round below repeat from * to the beginning of the round 2 working into the back loops only ch1 round slip_stitch to first double_crochet work 1 double_crochet into the back loop of each double_crochet of the round below round 16 ch1 *make 1 double_crochet s skip 1 stitch of the round below repeat from * to the end of the round return to working into the stitches in the normal way but you don t need to do a slip_stitch to finish round 3 ch1 1 double_crochet into each double_crochet of the round below cut the yarn leaving a 4 or 5 tail then using a yarn needle thread the tail through the remaining stitches repeat round 3 a further 4 times and pull tight to close the hole bottom weave the end of the yarn through some of the bottom stitches then push the needle through from the round 8 working into the back loops only ch1 bottom of the pincushion to the top pull the thread work 1 double_crochet into the back loop of each double_crochet of the round taut and snip off next to the cushion top the end of below the yarn should then disappear back into the cushion round 9 ch1 *make 8 double_crochet s skip 1 stitch of the round below repeat from * to the beginning of the round slip_stitch to first double_crochet round 10 ch1 *make 7 double_crochet s skip 1 stitch of the round below repeat from * to the beginning of the round slip_stitch to first double_crochet round 11 ch1 *make 6 double_crochet s skip 1 stitch of the round below repeat from * to the beginning of the round slip_stitch to first double_crochet round 12 ch1 *make 5 double_crochet s skip 1 stitch of the round below repeat from * to the beginning of the round slip_stitch to first double_crochet a sandra paul/cherry heart
